Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package docker-cli for versions less than 25.0.3-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package docker-cli for versions less than 25.0.3-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package docker-cli is earlier than 25.0.3-2, affected by CVE-2024-24786
